org.proj4

Class Proj4

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.proj4.Proj4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proj4Factory

    public class Proj4
extends Object
implements Proj4Factory
    This is the public test class to try the jproj api. Reads data from file. The input file has three lines of header:
    1) source projection code or option
    2) destination projection code or option
    3) rows of the data
    and after the header the data are put in the format: x0 y0 z0 x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2 ...etc etc example: srcProj: +proj=latlong +datum=WGS84 destProj: +init=epsg:32632 rows: 2 ...datatriplets
